thread.title: Feeling lucky? Powerball jackpot at $403 million for tonight's drawing
thread.title_full: Feeling lucky? Powerball jackpot at $403 million for tonight's drawing

author: freep.com
title: Feeling lucky? Powerball jackpot at $403 million for tonight's drawing
text:
MORE Dreamers and lottery enthusiasts, take note: The next Powerball drawing is tonight with the jackpot among the 10 largest in the history of the game.
After nobody matched all six numbers Saturday in the 44 states that play Powerball (along with D.C., Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands), the jackpot has swelled to an estimated $403 million for the 10:59 p.m. drawing.
Powerball tickets are $2 apiece and drawings take place Wednesday and Saturday nights. Though the odds of winning any Powerball prize are 1 in 24.9, the odds of scoring the jackpot are 1 in 292,201,338.
► $22.6M lottery ticket was sold in west Michigan
Last November, a group of 20 co-workers in Tennessee claimed a $420.9-million Powerball jackpot.
Powerball jackpots start at $40 million. The game's second prize for matching the first five numbers but missing the Powerball is $1 million. There were five $1 million prizes — in Louisiana, Maryland, New Jersey, New York, Pennsylvania and Texas — from Saturday's drawing. The game also offers a "power play" option that can mean larger payoffs for some lower-tier winnings.
USA TODAY Network contributed.
Contact Brian Manzullo: bmanzullo@freepress.com. Follow him on Twitter @BrianManzullo .
Be sure that you follow the Detroit Free Press on Twitter ( @freep ) and Instagram and like us on on Facebook .
